org.aserg.utility

Class IOFileUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aserg.utility.IOFileUtility

  • public class IOFileUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for reading from and writing to the configuration properties file.

      static void writeProperty(java.lang.String prop, java.lang.String value, java.lang.String propFile)
      This function loads the properties into the memory and then updates the specified property with given value, before writing back into properties file

      • writeProperty

        public static void writeProperty(java.lang.String prop,
                 java.lang.String value,
                 java.lang.String propFile)
        This function loads the properties into the memory and then updates the specified property with given value, before writing back into properties file
        Parameters:
        prop - the property that needs to be updated
        value - the new value for the property
        propFile - the filename where this property needs to be changed

      • readProperty

        public static java.lang.String readProperty(java.lang.String prop,
                            java.lang.String propFile)
        This function reads the value of a certain property from a specified property file
        Parameters:
        prop - the property to be read
        propFile - the file path from where the property will be read
        Returns:
